meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Daniel Lee Mike Luca Darren Harris-Fain Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7090.

td.p: Daniel Lee, an officer manager from Valley Village, California
Mike Luca, a sales coordinator from Westbrook, Maine
Darren Harris-Fain, an English professor from Prattville, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $47,800)

tr.td: KNOW YOUR PRODUCE
MORE THAN ONE MEANING
EASY SCIENCE
THE STATE OF THINGS
MY TV TITLE CHARACTER
DIPLOMA"C"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew shows off some potatoes.) Unlike the white-flesh potatoes, the purple ones are rich in anthocyanins, a pigment that gives them their color & also acts as this type compound, which fights free radicals')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kelly of the Clue Crew shows off some potatoes.) Unlike the white-flesh potatoes, the purple ones are rich in anthocyanins, a pigment that gives them their color & also acts as this type compound, which fights free radicals

Daniel
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
